channel.title: Help with server.java please
channel.description:
Ok I can fix this my self but it would take like 2-3 hours for me and it's getting kinda later over here so can some one help me or tell me what to do to fix this?This is what i get when i compile,
[code]server.java:223: illegal start of type public static;int ShutDownCounter = 0; ^ server.java:223: ';' expected public static;int ShutDownCounter = 0; ^ server.java:223: <identifier> expected public static;int ShutDownCounter = 0; ^ server.java:224: ';' expected public static CP CP == null; ^ 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
PS: I also got a server control panel so if this is the cause please tell me how to fix it and if you need to know my server.java or my control panel files let me know.

item.title: Help with server.java please
item.dc:creator: @coalman58 coalman58
item.description:
@coalman58 wrote:

Also I forgot to include even know i can modify it is that i also tried to instal a syi and crashing blocker but it didnt help or work for me so idk if that is even the problem so plz help me[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 12, 2009, 07:38:58 pm[/size][hr][quote=“The Soul, post:2, topic:261854”]Remove the semi-colon from ‘ShutDownCounter’.[/quote]wicth one there are 2 of them?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 12, 2009, 07:45:34 pm[/size][hr][quote=“The Soul, post:2, topic:261854”]Remove the semi-colon from ‘ShutDownCounter’.[/quote]Ok I fixed that but I still got this problem,

server.java:224: ';' expected public static CP CP == null; ^

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server.java please
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Remove the semi-colon from ‘ShutDownCounter’.

Read full topic
